Comment.val: harus pake event.Approval di css, kalau ecf di luar GL

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT IIF(T.ROWNUM = 1, T.KET, CAST(T.DOCNUM AS VARCHAR(50))) AS DocName, T.USERID, T.DateSEND, T.APPRID, T.SEQNO, T.TRXNO, T.DocNum, T.DateRcv, T.SENDER, T.FAPPR, T.KET FROM ( SELECT 1 AS ROWNUM, 'AUTO' AS USERID, H1.APPRID AS APPRID, 0 AS TRXNO, 0 AS DOCNUM, 1 AS SEQNO, GETDATE() AS DATESEND, GETDATE() AS DATERCV, '' AS SENDER, 0 AS FAPPR, H1.APPRNM AS KET FROM EA_HAPPR H1 WHERE H1.APPRID = H1.APPRID AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EA_MAIL M WHERE M.FAPPR = 0 AND H1.APPRID = M.APPRID AND M.USERID = :1 AND (M.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND M.APPRID = :4 ) UNION ALL SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY M.APPRID ORDER BY M.DATERCV DESC) + 1 RowNum, M.USERID, M.APPRID, M.TRXNO, M.DocNum, M.SEQNO, M.DateSEND, M.DateRcv, M.SENDER, M.FAPPR, M.KET FROM EA_MAIL M JOIN EA_HAPPR H2 ON M.APPRID = H2.APPRID WHERE M.FAPPR = 0 AND M.USERID = :1 AND (M.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND M.APPRID = :4 ) T ORDER BY T.APPRID, T.ROWNUM

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT ISNULL({32768,9}) AND Trim({32768,9}) <> '' , ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({32768,9}) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.USERID')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,1}) AND {0,1} AND NOT ISNULL({0,2}), ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(DStr({0,2}, {32768,36})) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.DateSEND')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,1}) AND {0,1} AND NOT ISNULL({0,3}), ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(DStr({0,3}, {32768,36})) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.DateSEND')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,4}) AND Trim({0,4}) <> '', ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,4}) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.APPRID')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT IIF(RowNum = 1, CONCAT(TRIM(S.Description), ' - ', DocNum), CONCAT(DocNum, '')) AS DocName, UserId, DateSend, APPRID, SeqNo, TrxNo, DocNum, DateRcv, Sender, FAPPR, Ket FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY APPRID ORDER BY DATERCV DESC) RowNum, * FROM EA_MAIL A WHERE A.FAPPR = 0 AND A.USERID = :1 AND (A.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND A.APPRID = :4 ) B JOIN SYS_GCM S ON S.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND S.GCM_ID = B.APPRID ORDER BY B.APPRID ASC, B.RowNum ASC
select CONCAT('\ ,', STRING_AGG(TRIM(APPRID), ',')) AS ItemList, CONCAT('ALL APPROVAL,', STRING_AGG(TRIM(APPRNM), ',')) AS DisplayList from EA_HAPPR

Comment.val: harus pake event.Approval di css, kalau ecf di luar GL

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT IIF(T.ROWNUM = 1, T.KET, CAST(T.DOCNUM AS VARCHAR(50))) AS DocName, T.USERID, T.DateSEND, T.APPRID, T.SEQNO, T.TRXNO, T.DocNum, T.DateRcv, T.SENDER, T.FAPPR, T.KET FROM ( SELECT 1 AS ROWNUM, 'AUTO' AS USERID, H1.APPRID AS APPRID, 0 AS TRXNO, 0 AS DOCNUM, 1 AS SEQNO, GETDATE() AS DATESEND, GETDATE() AS DATERCV, '' AS SENDER, 0 AS FAPPR, H1.APPRNM AS KET FROM EA_HAPPR H1 WHERE H1.APPRID = H1.APPRID AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM EA_MAIL M WHERE M.FAPPR = 0 AND H1.APPRID = M.APPRID AND M.USERID = :1 AND (M.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND M.APPRID = :4 ) UNION ALL SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY M.APPRID ORDER BY M.DATERCV DESC) + 1 RowNum, M.USERID, M.APPRID, M.TRXNO, M.DocNum, M.SEQNO, M.DateSEND, M.DateRcv, M.SENDER, M.FAPPR, M.KET FROM EA_MAIL M JOIN EA_HAPPR H2 ON M.APPRID = H2.APPRID WHERE M.FAPPR = 0 AND M.USERID = :1 AND (M.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND M.APPRID = :4 ) T ORDER BY T.APPRID, T.ROWNUM

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT ISNULL({32768,9}) AND Trim({32768,9}) <> '' , ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({32768,9}) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.USERID')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,1}) AND {0,1} AND NOT ISNULL({0,2}), ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(DStr({0,2}, {32768,36})) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.DateSEND')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,1}) AND {0,1} AND NOT ISNULL({0,3}), ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(DStr({0,3}, {32768,36})) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.DateSEND')
IF(NOT ISNULL({0,4}) AND Trim({0,4}) <> '', ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,4}) & ASCIIChr(39), 'M.APPRID')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT IIF(RowNum = 1, CONCAT(TRIM(S.Description), ' - ', DocNum), CONCAT(DocNum, '')) AS DocName, UserId, DateSend, APPRID, SeqNo, TrxNo, DocNum, DateRcv, Sender, FAPPR, Ket FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY APPRID ORDER BY DATERCV DESC) RowNum, * FROM EA_MAIL A WHERE A.FAPPR = 0 AND A.USERID = :1 AND (A.DateSEND BETWEEN :2 AND :3) AND A.APPRID = :4 ) B JOIN SYS_GCM S ON S.CONDITION = 'OBJTYPE' AND S.GCM_ID = B.APPRID ORDER BY B.APPRID ASC, B.RowNum ASC
